name: move-tabs
description: Move tabs allows you to move your tabs with keyboard shortcuts. Use 'Ctrl + left/right/home/end' keys to move your tabs.
author: Aurélien MANCA (http://www.amanca.fr)

preferences.name: forceDocumentFocus
preferences.description: Force the document to have the focus to move tabs.
preferences.title: Prevent moving tabs when using the navigation or other toolbars?

preferences.name: useAutoPin
preferences.title: Pin tab when moving a tab in the pinned tabs area.
